thread.section_title: Hampton Inn & Suites San Francisco-Burlingame-Airport South - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 3.5 stars
thread.title_full: 3.5 stars - Review of Hampton Inn & Suites San Francisco-Burlingame-Airport South, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: rameyfamily
title: 3.5 stars
text: My husband stayed here while on a two-week business trip. The room was clean and comfortable and wifi speed was acceptable but the breakfast was just ok. For some reason, they always did the lobby vacuuming during breakfast time so he was unable to hear the TV for the morning news. Overall, the place was nothing special.
